name: NBLoadableFromXibView
summary: Easily create a reusable xib and class to put anywhere.
description: Wouldnt it be cool if you could easily drop a UIView on your storyboard set its class and have it automatically loaded from another XIB file? Using this library you can do just that. You can easily create reusable components, just subclass NBLoadableFromXibView, create a XIB and set its file owner to the subclass.
